item.title: Mary Katrantzou, known as the "Queen of Prints," is featured in the adidas Originals fall/winter collection
item.description:
Source: adidas. Shoes from the Mary Katrantzou collection. Renowned fashion designer Mary Katrantzou, often called the “Queen of Prints,” has partnered with sportswear giant adidas. Their collaboration, the adidas Originals by Mary Katrantzou collection, features apparel and footwear inspired by Katrantzou’s signature style. Katrantzou’s designs are known for their fusion of vibrant graphics, structural silhouettes, and cutting-edge technologies, resulting in a contemporary and feminine aesthetic. For this collection, she drew inspiration from classic adidas shoe designs, incorporating elements like outsoles, laces, and iconic brand details into her unique pieces...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/mary-katrantzou-known-as-the-queen-of-prints-is-featured-in-the-adidas-originals-fall-winter-collection/

item.title: Enjoy delicious autumn treats at The Shilla Seoul and The Shilla Jeju
item.description:
Source: The Shilla Seoul. Both the Shilla Seoul and Shilla Jeju hotels are celebrating autumn with a variety of special promotions and activities. The Shilla Seoul’s upscale Korean restaurant, La Yeon, will offer a special autumn menu featuring seasonal ingredients like pine nuts, sweet potatoes, and seafood in keeping with traditional culinary practices. La Yeon made its debut on the list of Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants in 2015 at position 38 and received the coveted One To Watch award...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/enjoy-delicious-autumn-treats-at-the-shilla-seoul-and-the-shilla-jeju/

item.title: The Fall/Winter 2015 Collections have been launched by CH Carolina Herrera
item.description:
CH, a subsidiary brand under the Carolina Herrera fashion house, has launched their Fall/Winter 2015 collections for both men and women. The Women’s Collection uses vibrant pops of color like reds, sky blues, and fuchsias, which stand out against a darker color scheme with white and ivory accents. Formal evening wear is designed using luxurious fabrics like silks, lace, and jacquard. The feminine looks are completed with signature CH Carolina Herrera details like bows and ruffles...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-fall-winter-2015-collections-have-been-launched-by-ch-carolina-herrera/
